author: benh
msg: Adds --webui-port flag to Mesos master. Closes #51.

author: benh
msg: ZK needs --with-pic on linux when using --with-local-zookeeper flag. I have reproduced this multiple times on the R Cluster node r2. See issue #48.
With --with-pic added, -fPIC seems to be unecessary, so I'm removing those from the configure flags.
I've tested this patch on OS X and also on Debian Linux (on the r cluster).
